attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should stop the explosion of blue suited men and women in quangos (non-governmental organisations) milking the state of its millions.The government should stop any further disintegration of the United Kingdom by stopping the formation of more regional parliaments etc, Mayors and such like organisations. The mayor of london and all such organisations will be closed from the next election.Save the public valuable funds for hospitals, pensioners and care of the British citizens and british culture.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not just 'Quangoss'
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
